fulltext:
CURRICULUM VITAE 
BUI THI NGOC TRINH 
Year of birth: 1989 
Gender: 
Female 
Marital status: Married 
Country: 
Vietnam 
Mobile: 
Email: 
Address: 
Phu Nhuan District, Ho Chi Minh City 
Life philosophy 
“You must be the change you wish to see in the world” – Mahatma Gandhi 
Career path highlight 
I have more than 3 year experiences in operation management in retail industry and 2 years 
working in F&B industry as Marketing and Customer Service Director. 
Besides, I used to establish my own business in fashion retail industry that I am really 
passionate about. Working on clothing is my favorite one. 
Education 
 Master of Business (July 2012 – June 2013)
Charles Sturt University, Sydney, Australia 
Major: Marketing management 
 Bachelor of Economics (September 2007 – August 2011)
University of Economics Ho Chi Minh City 
Major: Planning & Investment 
 Planning a business project

 Analyzing cost and benefit of project
Scholarship 
 Institute of Potential Leaders – IPL (August 2015 – July 2016)
IPL is the scholarship program founded by a group of dedicated 
entrepreneurs, intellectuals and the PACE Institute of Management with the 
purpose of finding “talent seeds” to cultivate, becoming new leader 
generation. 
Three parts: 
 Liberal Education
 Leadership Development
 Professional Development


Experience 
May 2017 – Present: OFOOD Trading & Service JSC 
Job Title: Marketing and Customer Service Director 
 Taking responsibility for all strategic and operational marketing activities to achieve 
yearly sales target of 2 restaurant store chains which are Ga Nuong O O O (totally 10 
stores in HCMC & Hanoi) and Bò-Lế-Rồ (totally 9 stores in HCMC & Hanoi).

 Working and negotiating with another business partners (Foody, Adayroi, Grab, Go 
Viet, Ahamove, Lalamove, Jamja, Cling Me, Super Vip,…) to expand sales channels 
and increase revenue for company

 Managing all customer service activities, including call center, delivery service, 
customer complain settlement, B2B customer relationship management

 Setting up and managing all new business projects of the company
Achievement: 
 Total company revenue in 2018 increased 160% vs 2017

 Completed brand strategic guideline for Bò-Lế-Rồ

 Successfully operated 2 big marketing campaign with Foody (“Delivery grilled 
chicken only 89k”, increase daily revenue 41%) and Jamja (“Mediterranean grilled 
chicken with hot chilli only 99K”, increase daily revenue 38%)

 Rearranged working hour of customer service staffs and saved 25% salary cost of 
Customer Service Department

 Successfully setting up customer relationship management software and saved 30% 
time of making delivery order
August 2016 – March 2018: Plus N (Clothing Brand) 
Title: Business Owner & Project Manager 
Plus N was the clothing brand with the simple and elegant style. The mission of Plus N is to 
provide the most suitable outfit and make women more confidence. Plus N’s target 
customers are young and modern women from 22 – 28 year olds living Ho Chi Minh City. 
I was the project manager - managing all the business activities, including purchasing, 
production, marketing and customer service. I started this business project from 2016 and be 
sorry of closing it in the early 2018. 
Learning point: 
 Know how to manage the business with the limited resources

 Know how to recruit the suitable person for the project

 Gained much knowledge in clothing manufacturing

 Understand customer insight in purchasing clothes
Sep 2014 – May 2017: Nguyen Kim Trading JSC 
Job Title: Executive Assistant to COO 
 Following up sales budget monthly, quarterly and yearly of Nguyen Kim store chain

 Following up all operation activities in details and updating to COO

 Be the point of contact between COO and other directors in the company, managing 
information flow

 Directly updating and reporting all internal management activities to COO

 Organizing materials and activities to accomplish goals efficiently and effectively

 Coordinating & managing company’s internal projects
Oct 2013 – Sep 2014: Ecount ERP company 
Job Title: Global Marketing Executive 
 Being one of first staffs of Ecount in Vietnam, participating in all works to establish 
the business in the early days in Vietnam

 Building strategy, planning and executing all marketing activities for Ecount 
Vietnam  
 Working with agencies to organize company commercial events

 Setting up company website in Vietnam, ensuring that all visitors were provided 
enough information about company’s service & product

 Testing an effects of website and software interface, suggesting a modification if it is 
necessary, ensuring the most convenient for users

 Managing Google adwords to keep stable traffic for Ecount Vietnam’s website
Skills 
Languages: English (Advanced User) 
Soft skills: leadership, problem solving, time management, data analysis, self-learning, 
communication, training

educations.school: University of Economics Ho Chi Minh City
